SELECT t.AUTOID, t.AUTONAME, t.CUSTNO, t.STATE, t.TRADETYPE, t.TYPE, t.CYCLE, t.DAT, t.FROM_FUNDCORPNO AS FROMFUNDCORPNO, t.FROM_FUNDCODE AS FROMFUNDCODE, t.FROM_CHARGETYPE AS FROMCHARGETYPE, t.FROM_BANKSERIALID AS FROMBANKSERIALID, t.FROM_BANKACCO AS FROMBANKACCO, BS2.BANKNM AS FROMBANKNM, t.FROM_ACCOID AS FROMACCOID, t.FROM_TRADEACCO AS FROMTRADEACCO, t.TO_FUNDCORPNO AS TOFUNDCORPNO, t.TO_FUNDCODE AS TOFUNDCODE, t.TO_CHARGETYPE AS TOCHARGETYPE, t.TO_BANKSERIALID AS TOBANKSERIALID, t.TO_BANKACCO AS TOBANKACCO, BS1.BANKNM AS TOBANKNM, t.TO_ACCOID AS TOACCOID, t.TO_TRADEACCO TOTRADEACCO, t.AUTOAMT, t.AUTOVOL, t.LASTDATE, t.NEXTDATE, t.SUMMARY, t.CREATETIME, t.UPDATETIME FROM AUTOTRADE t LEFT JOIN BANKCARDINFO b1 ON T.TO_BANKSERIALID = b1.SERIALID LEFT JOIN BANKCARDINFO b2 ON T.FROM_BANKSERIALID = b2.SERIALID LEFT JOIN BANKBASE bs1 ON b1.BANKNO = bs1.BANKNO LEFT JOIN BANKBASE bs2 ON b2.BANKNO = bs2.BANKNO WHERE
t.AUTOID = #{autoid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
t.CUSTNO = #{custno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
t.TRADETYPE = #{tradetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
t.NEXTDATE = #{nextdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
t.STATE <> 'C' ORDER BY t.STATE ASC, t.UPDATETIME DESC
